title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: The bug report is about the issue of the report design storing absolute paths instead of relative paths when including a library. It is desired to save the relative path instead of the absolute path.
OB: Currently, the report design stores the absolute path. For example, in the <property> tag, the fileName attribute contains the absolute path: 'E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'. The <property> tag also contains the namespace property: 'lib1'.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate the relative path and save it. For example, if the report design is located at $project/test, the relative path should be '../../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a new report design.
3. Include a library in the report design.
4. Check the path of the included library to verify if it is stored as a relative path.
